message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $112.50. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $107.50. Would you be willing to sell the product at that price?
I understand that you're close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $109.50. It's the best I can do without losing too much profit.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit away from my target price. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $106?
I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $108. It's the best I can do without losing too much profit.
